content: Zhi-Hua Zhou's Homepage Brief CV Zhi-Hua Zhou can be pronounced simply as [Jihua Joe] Professor, Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Vice President, Nanjing University, China Fellow of the ACM, AAAI, AAAS, IEEE et al. Correspondence Mail: Zhi-Hua Zhou Vice President, University Office Nanjing University, Xianlin Campus 163 Xianlin Avenue, Qixia District Nanjing 210023, China URL: http://www.lamda.nju.edu.cn/zhouzh/ Email: zhouzh at nju dot edu dot cn or zhouzh.gm at gmail.com (Gmail infrequently read; to use only when emails to university account returned.) [Interest] [Career] [Award] {Activity} {Publication} [Course] {Student} {LAMDA Group} Research Interest Research is for curiosity and fun, though practical implications can emerge. I am interested in general machine learning and data mining technologies and theoretical underpinnings. During the past decades I have been working on the following topics: Ensemble learning Evolutionary learning Weakly supervised learning (incl. semi-supervised learning, active learning, multi-instance learning, crowdsourcing learning, learning with noisy labels, etc.) Multi-label learning Imbalanced learning (incl. cost-sensitive learning, class-imbalance learning) Learning theory Face recognition ...... Some of the above topics are still in my concern, some faded out, while some new ones come in: Open-environment machine learning Machine learning + logic reasoning Learnware ...... 周志华 著.机器学习,北京:清华大学出版社,2016.
